languages.text: "Похожа?! Ты слеп, мирянин? Они же все разные! Индивидуальные дефекты кожуха, номерная сигнатура антенны, мерцательный спектр вид-скрина! Как их вообще можно перепутать?!" {n}Возмущенно хрипя, техножрец тычет пальцем в вокс-станцию, абсолютно неотличимую от любой другой встречавшейся вам в жизни вокс-станции.{/n}

"Looks like? Are you blind, layperson? Every vox-caster is unique! The distinct defects on the cover, the number signature on the antenna, the scintillating spectrum of the vid-screen! How can you possibly mistake one for another?" {n}Rasping indignantly, the Tech-Priest pokes a finger at the vox-caster, which looks completely indistinguishable from any other vox-caster you have ever seen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Похожа?! Ты слеп, мирянин? Они же все разные! Индивидуальные дефекты кожуха, номерная сигнатура антенны, мерцательный спектр вид-скрина! Как их вообще можно перепутать?!" {n}Возмущенно хрипя, техножрец тычет пальцем в вокс-станцию, абсолютно неотличимую от любой другой встречавшейся вам в жизни вокс-станции.{/n}

How can you possibly mistake one for another?" {n}Rasping indignantly, the Tech-Priest pokes a finger at the vox-caster, which looks completely indistinguishable from any other vox-caster you have ever seen.{/n}

languages.text: "Sieht aus wie? Seid Ihr blind, Laie? Jeder Vox-Transmitter ist einzigartig! Die Effekte auf dem Cover, die Nummer auf der Antenne, das Farbspektrum auf dem Vidschirm! Wie kann man die miteinander verwechseln?" {n}Der Techpriester lamentiert frustriert und deutet mit einem Finger auf den Vox-Transmitter, der für dich genauso aussieht wie jeder andere Vox-Transmitter, der dir jemals untergekommen ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Looks like? Are you blind, layperson? Every vox-caster is unique! The distinct defects on the cover, the number signature on the antenna, the scintillating spectrum of the vid-screen! How can you possibly mistake one for another?" {n}Rasping indignantly, the Tech-Priest pokes a finger at the vox-caster, which looks completely indistinguishable from any other vox-caster you have ever seen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sieht aus wie? Seid Ihr blind, Laiin? Jede Voxstation ist einzigartig! Die Effekte auf dem Cover, die Nummer auf der Antenne, das Farbspektrum auf dem Vidschirm! Wie kann man die miteinander verwechseln?" {n}Der Techpriester lamentiert frustriert und deutet mit einem Finger auf die Voxstation, die für dich genauso aussieht wie jede andere Voxstation, die dir jemals untergekommen ist.{/n}

languages.text: « "On dirait" ? Êtes-vous donc aveugle, profane ? Chaque émetteur vox est unique ! Les imperfections sur la façade, les chiffres sur l'antenne, le spectre scintillant sur l'écran ! Comment serait-il possible de les confondre ? » {n}Sifflant d'indignation, le technoprêtre tapote l'émetteur vox, qui ressemble trait pour trait à tous les autres émetteurs vox que vous avez croisés dans votre vie.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Looks like? Are you blind, layperson? Every vox-caster is unique! The distinct defects on the cover, the number signature on the antenna, the scintillating spectrum of the vid-screen! How can you possibly mistake one for another?" {n}Rasping indignantly, the Tech-Priest pokes a finger at the vox-caster, which looks completely indistinguishable from any other vox-caster you have ever seen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « "On dirait" ? Êtes-vous donc aveugle, profane ? Chaque poste-vox est unique ! Les imperfections sur la façade, les chiffres sur l'antenne, le spectre scintillant sur l'écran ! Comment serait-il possible de les confondre ? » {n}Sifflant d'indignation, le technoprêtre tapote le poste-vox, qui ressemble trait pour trait à tous les autres postes-vox que vous avez croisés dans votre vie.{/n}

languages.text: “看起来像？你是瞎了吗，教外人士？每台通讯器都是独一无二的！无论是它外壳上明显的缺陷，天线上的数字签名，还是视讯屏幕上闪烁的光谱！怎么可能会有人认错呢？”{n}帕斯卡愤愤不平地用手指戳着这台通讯器，但它与你之前见过的其它通讯器似乎没有任何区别。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Looks like? Are you blind, layperson? Every vox-caster is unique! The distinct defects on the cover, the number signature on the antenna, the scintillating spectrum of the vid-screen! How can you possibly mistake one for another?" {n}Rasping indignantly, the Tech-Priest pokes a finger at the vox-caster, which looks completely indistinguishable from any other vox-caster you have ever seen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “看起来像？你是瞎了吗，门外汉？每台音阵设备都是独一无二的！无论是它外壳上明显的缺陷，天线上的数字签名，还是视讯屏幕上闪烁的光谱！怎么可能会有人认错呢？”{n}帕斯卡愤愤不平地用手指戳着这座通讯站，但它与你之前见过的其它通讯站似乎没有任何区别。{/n}

languages.text: 「みたい、だと？お前の目は節穴か、俗人よ？どの音声通信送受信装置も全くの別物だ！特徴的なカバーの欠陥に、アンテナのシグネチャー、輝くスクリーンのスペクトル！見間違えようがないだろう？」{n}憤然と話しながら、技術司祭はこれまで見てきたものと全く違いの分からないヴォクスキャスターに指をさす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Looks like? Are you blind, layperson? Every vox-caster is unique! The distinct defects on the cover, the number signature on the antenna, the scintillating spectrum of the vid-screen! How can you possibly mistake one for another?" {n}Rasping indignantly, the Tech-Priest pokes a finger at the vox-caster, which looks completely indistinguishable from any other vox-caster you have ever seen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「みたい、だと？お前の目は節穴か、俗人よ？どのヴォクスステーションも全くの別物だ！特徴的なカバーの欠陥に、アンテナのシグネチャー、輝くスクリーンのスペクトル！見間違えようがないだろう？」{n}憤然と話しながら、技術司祭はこれまで見てきたものと全く違いの分からないヴォクスステーションに指をさす。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Parece? ¿Está ciego, laico? ¡Cada voco amplificador es único! ¡Se diferencian por la cubierta, la numeración de la antena y el espectro centelleante de la pantalla de vídeo! ¿Cómo ha podido confundirlas?». {n}Bramando, indignado, el tecnosacerdote señala con un dedo al voco amplificador, que parece completamente indistinguible de cualquier otro que hayas visto antes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Looks like? Are you blind, layperson? Every vox-caster is unique! The distinct defects on the cover, the number signature on the antenna, the scintillating spectrum of the vid-screen! How can you possibly mistake one for another?" {n}Rasping indignantly, the Tech-Priest pokes a finger at the vox-caster, which looks completely indistinguishable from any other vox-caster you have ever seen.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Parece? ¿Está ciego, laico? ¡Cada estación de voco es única! ¡Se diferencian por la cubierta, la numeración de la antena y el espectro centelleante de la pantalla de vídeo! ¿Cómo ha podido confundirlas?». {n}Bramando, indignado, el tecnosacerdote señala con un dedo la estación de voco, que parece completamente indistinguible de cualquier otra estación de voco que hayas visto antes.{/n}

languages.text: "Benziyor mu? Kör müsün be avam? Her voksyayar eşsizdir! Kapağındaki ayırt edici kusurlar, antenindeki sayı imzası, video ekranının parlaklık spektrumu! Nasıl bir başkasıyla karıştırabilirsin ki?" {n}Öfkeden hırıldayan Tekno Rahip, parmağını gördüğün diğer voksyayarlarla neredeyse tıpatıp aynı olan voksyayara uzatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Looks like? Are you blind, layperson? Every vox-caster is unique!
